avalancheActivity.highlights: At elevated altitudes a moderate avalanche danger will prevail. Weak layers in the old snowpack represent the main danger.
avalancheActivity.comment: The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular at the base of rock walls and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. The wind slabs remain in some cases prone to triggering at elevated altitudes. Avalanches can be released, mostly by large loads.

snowpackStructure.comment: Weak layers exist in the snowpack. The weather conditions gave rise to consolidation of the snowpack at low and intermediate altitudes. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.

tendency.highlights: The weather will be partly cloudy.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind slabs remain in some cases prone to triggering at elevated altitudes.
avalancheActivity.comment: The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular at the base of rock walls and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. Avalanches can be released, mostly by large loads.

snowpackStructure.comment: The snowpack will be stable at low and intermediate altitudes. There is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.

tendency.highlights: The weather will be partly cloudy.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Weak layers in the old snowpack represent the main danger.
avalancheActivity.comment: The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular at the base of rock walls and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack. Avalanches can be released by large loads.

snowpackStructure.comment: Only a small amount of snow is lying for the time of year. The weather conditions gave rise to consolidation of the snowpack. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface. Weak layers exist in the snowpack.

tendency.highlights: The weather will be partly cloudy.
